author: zakanick
title: No-Code SSI SaaS for mass adoption
description: Adoption of SSI is low because people have no easy tools for creating interoperable & goal-oriented credential workflows.
solution: Add support of Atala PRISM to our proven no-code SSI SaaS platform to easily build, deploy & use credentials in goal-oriented interactions.
experience: Developed & commercialised no-code SSI platform in: Clinical labs in USA, Mental health clinics in USA, DeGov in Europe,Refugee ID in Turkey
